text: If you dissect a bird%% To diagram the tongue
To diagram the tongue%% You'll cut the chord
You'll cut the chord%% Articulating song.
Articulating song. If you flay a beast
If you flay a beast%% To marvel at the mane
To marvel at the mane%% You'll wreck the rest
You'll wreck the rest%% From which the fur began.
From which the fur began. If you pluck out the heart
If you pluck out the heart%% To find what makes it move,
To find what makes it move, You'll halt the clock
You'll halt the clock%% That syncopates our love.
